page.title: 04Lord Stair-Castle Kennedy
page.content: Lord Stair visited our school and answered questions.He said that because Lochinch Castle is quite new there are not lots of historical items but there are some weapons,flags and animal trophies. He told us about visits by The Queen,Prince Philip, Prince Charles and Princess Anne.There are several trees planted to mark these occasions.He has seen many changes in the last 25 years especially in the reduction of staff. Instead of twenty gardeners there are only three. The Gardens now open to the public every day and Lord Stair rents out the pheasant and the deer shooting.He told us hoe several plants have been developed at the Gardens including the beautiful Lochinch Buddliae.His favourite parts of the Gardens depended on the seasons but he especially liked the red rhododendrons
